summary: This is a domestic witness travel request form from the SDNY Victim/Witness Unit, dated November 8, 2021, for a fact witness to appear at the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The witness is scheduled to travel to New York on December 1, 2021, and depart on December 3, 2021, to testify.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the travel request form (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell).

events.title: Witness Travel for Maxwell Trial
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to travel to the Southern District of New York to appear for the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Trial Preparation Date
events.description: A previously scheduled date for trial preparation for the witness, as indicated on the form.

events.title: Trial Preparation Date
events.description: A previously scheduled date for trial preparation for the witness, as indicated on the form.

keyFacts: A fact witness was scheduled to travel to New York to testify at the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in December 2021.
The witness was not a victim-witness, a government employee, or facing criminal charges.
The travel was approved under the FEWS appropriation for court testimony.
The document is a standardized administrative form for coordinating witness travel for federal trials.
